00170                 Deprecated Compatibility Functions
00171                 Provided for compatibility with Tosser I
00172             */
00174             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(insert) inline void PutData ( T const & _rec ) { insert ( _rec ); };
00175             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(insert_back) inline void PutDataAtStart ( T const & _rec ) { insert_front ( _rec ); };
00176             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(insert_back) inline void PutDataAtEnd ( T const & _rec ) { insert_back ( _rec ); };
00177             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(insert_at) inline void PutDataAtIndex ( T const & _rec, size_t _index ) { insert_at ( _rec, _index ); };
00178             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(find) inline size_t FindData ( T const & _rec ) { return find ( _rec ); };
00179             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(remove) inline void RemoveData ( size_t _index ) { remove ( _index ); };
00180             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(remove) void ChangeData ( T const & _rec, size_t _index );
00181             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(size) inline size_t Size () const { return size(); };
00182             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION_N inline void Empty () { empty(); };
00183             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(get) inline T getData ( size_t _index ) const { return get ( _index ); };
00184             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(get) inline T GetData ( size_t _index ) const { return get ( _index ); };
00185             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(valid) inline bool validIndex ( size_t _index ) const { return valid ( _index ); };
00186             _CC_DEPRECATE_FUNCTION(valid) inline bool ValidIndex ( size_t _index ) const { return valid ( _index ); };
